item.title: Police said the footage shows Hadush Kebatu in a library in Dalston Square in Hackney, north London, at around 18:00 on Friday. He was freed in error weeks after being jailed for sexually assaulting a 14-year-old girl and a woman in Epping, Essex. #MetPol
